text: SEG is the product of a multidisciplinary research project connecting the dots among strategy, governance, and neuroscience research, opening a new conversation of headlines, introducing the free energy principle of strategy management.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: SEG redefines the nexus of structure and cognition, ABV, so attention-based view, advances the dynamic capability view, and from the managerial to the core level, and establishes strategy as an inactive Bayesian inference challenge.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: In terms of future research, four areas should advance the optimization of FEG.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: One, language and communication, in particular, explainability of corporate purpose, prediction models, and predictions.
speaker: SPEAKER_01

text: Two, body cognition in terms of a deeper understanding around the neurobiology underlying leadership's world engagement, as well as false inference.

text: Thanks, and I'll leave this next part.
